title: Confusion reigns over 'controversial' Bangladesh wicket
description: Watch as Bangladesh's Shorna Akter is dismissed after a "controversial" wicket decision against West Indies during the first innings of their Women's T20 World Cup match in Sharjah.
excerpt: Watch as Bangladesh's Shorna Akter is dismissed after a "controversial" wicket decision against West Indies during the first innings of their Women's T20 World Cup match in Sharjah.

html:
Watch as Bangladesh's Shorna Akter is dismissed after a "controversial" wicket decision against West Indies during the first innings of their Women's T20 World Cup match in Sharjah.
